      • Robot

        public Robot(java.awt.image.BufferedImage texture,
     java.awt.image.BufferedImage textureBoost,
     java.awt.image.BufferedImage textureBrake,
     int x,
     int y)
        Create a robot.
        Parameters:
        texture - Standard texture to use.
        textureBoost - Texture to use when the robot is boosting.
        textureBrake - Texture to use when the robot is braking.
        x - X position of the robot.
        y - Y position of the robot.
